oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Snow scene along Church Street, looking east towards Fifth Avenue, Nashville, Tennessee, 2016 January 22
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The snow-covered urban landscape along Church Street and Fifth Avenue in downtown Nashville, Tennessee, January 22nd, 2016. This was the biggest snow in more than a decade to blanket Middle Tennessee with several inches of snow. Eight inches of snowfall was reported in Nashville, making it an historic weather event. Several buildings are pictured in this photo: Downtown Presbyterian Church; Fifth Third Center; Puckett’s Grocery; Paramore Digital; Veridian Tower; and the Fourth and Church Building. A construction crane at the 505 residential skyscraper site under construction at the intersection of Fifth Avenue and Church Street is also in view. Forms part of the Leanne Garland Photograph Collection. 1 digital photograph.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Downtown Presbyterian Church (Nashville, Tenn.); Paramore Digital (Nashville, Tenn.); Veridian Tower (Nashville, Tenn.); Fifth Third Center (Nashville, Tenn.)
